metadata.title: FarJing Women's Maxi Dress Casual Loose Summer Butterfly Print V-Neck Sleeveless Bohemian Caftan Long Dress Plus Size
features: The New Collection of this Maxi Dress: The fabric is polyester instead of cotton, which has fluid drape: Smooth & Micro Elastic. Avoid Wrinkles In Laundry.--Women Plus Size Butterfly Print Daily Sleeveless Vintage Boho V Neck Maxi Dress

Loose fit, suitable for a variety of occasions: Casual, Beach, Shopping, Date,Street, Office, Work, Basic, Party, Outdoor, School, Nursing,Formal , Dailywear etc.Perfect to dress it up with a beautiful necklace and small high heels to a friend's wedding,Stylish dresses for women.

Adjustable straps and sexy V-neck design both front and back. Delicate pockets design on both dress sides with a good seam,Relaxed fit and fluent silhouette gender bohemian style, makes you more attractive.

Machine Washable/ Hand wash cold/ Air Dry,low iron if needed.--the newly-applied women's dresses/skirts are available in a variety of colors to meet your daily, vacation, and work needs. They are essential clothes in your wardrobe. Come and buy, look forward to your order.

Casual maxi dress look appears in the street, party, beach and any daily occasion with some accessories,Fit for summer,autumn or spring, it make you looks more Casual, Stylish, Cute, Great visual effect.--if you have any questions in the purchase process, please send us an email, your question will be answered within 24 hours.
